projects.title: VOTE VTO
projects.description: CRUD application built using React and Firebase, offering features such as registration, login, poll creation, and a poll dashboard. It incorporates functional programming principles and utilizes the dynamic routing capabilities of React Router DOM; currently used by AMVVD to make decisions regarding important events.

projects.title: Grandma's Recipes
projects.description: Cooking assistant made with react, json as database, react router dom for dynamic routing. This project is an homage to my grandmother, who was a cook during the communist period. The recipes are taken from her cookbook.

projects.title: Currency Exchange App
projects.description: Currency exchange application with converter and currency evolution over time functionalities, made with vanilla JS and web API.

projects.title: Hangman with Cars
projects.description: My own version of hangman, with cars and highscore functionality implemented with local storage, designed on the principle of functional programming.
